com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl

Class BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.extensibility.IExtensible
      • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar>
  • Type Parameters:
    Rend - The renderer type that performs the drawing of the element to the screen or anywhere else
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the element
    Scalar - The type that Pos's individual components consist of (- see VectUtil )
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, Element, Extensible, Drawable<Rend,Pos>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAbstractLayout, BasicLabel, DummyDrawableElem, ImageIcon, Slider

    public abstract class BasicAbstractDrawableElem<Rend,Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends IExtensible
implements DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>
    The most basic base class for implementations of DrawableElem. Provides the default size behavior.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    DrawableElem, DefaultSizeBehavior

      • BasicAbstractDrawableElem

                                 Pos max,
                                 Pos min,
                                 Pos pref)
        Constructs the Properties associated with the size behavior of this.
        Parameters:
        max - default value for maxSize Property
        min - default value for minSize Property
        pref - default value for prefSize Property
        decomp - Pos decomposer to initilize the DefaultSizeBehavior component

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public ReadonlyProperty<Pos> size()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        The real size of the Drawable, which it takes when rendered on the screen. Supposedly should be derived from the values of other present size parameters, therefore it cannot be modified directly.
        Specified by:
        size in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>
        Specified by:
        size in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>
        See Also:
        DefaultSizeBehavior

      • maxSize

        public Property<Pos> maxSize()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        The maximum size that the Drawable can attain. Should be strongly greater than or equal to minSize
        Specified by:
        maxSize in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>

      • minSize

        public Property<Pos> minSize()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        The minimum size that the Drawable can attain. Should be strongly lower than or equal to maxSize
        Specified by:
        minSize in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>

      • prefSize

        public Property<Pos> prefSize()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        The preffered size that the Drawable will have if it is within the bounds of minSize and (maxSize,_sizeConstraint).
        Specified by:
        prefSize in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>

      • _sizeConstraint

        public Property<Pos> _sizeConstraint()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        The size constraint that can be applied by the owner of the Drawable. Used eg. if the element is in a layout to regulate its size without affecting the maxSize defined by the user. If null, then no constraint is to be applied. Doesen't have shortcuts implemented for .get and .set to descourage BFU from using it.
        Specified by:
        _sizeConstraint in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>
        See Also:
        UberElement, UberDrawable

      • getVectUtil

        public abstract VectUtil<Pos,Scalar> getVectUtil()
        Description copied from interface: DrawableElem
        Gets the VectUtil for the vector type used by this.
        Specified by:
        getVectUtil in interface DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>
        Specified by:
        getVectUtil in interface Drawable<Rend,Pos>

      • DEFAULT_SIZE_BEHAVIOR__FACTORY

        protected DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar> DEFAULT_SIZE_BEHAVIOR__FACTORY(VectDecomposer<Pos,Scalar> decomp,
                                                                         Pos max,
                                                                         Pos min,
                                                                         Pos pref)
        Override this if you want to specify the instance of DefaultSizeBehavior being used by the DrawableElem yourself.
        Parameters:
        decomp - VectDecomposer to be used by the DefaultSizeBehavior
        max - default value for maxSize property
        min - default value for minSize property
        pref - default value for prefSize property
        Returns:
        new DefaultSizeBehavior[Pos, Scalar](max, min, pred, decomp)
